home.title: Welcome to Our Company
home.subtitle: We provide excellent services for your business
home.description: With over 10 years of experience, we deliver top-notch solutions tailored to your needs.

hero.label: Your Best-Logistics Partner
hero.title: Seamless Logistics for a Connected World
hero.description: Trusted shipping & supply chain partner for your business growth. From global freight and warehousing to last-mile delivery, we ensure speed, reliability.

homeAbout.label: About Us
homeAbout.description: With decades of experience, we specialize in turning challenges into <highlight>smart logistics solutions</highlight> that drive efficiency and reability.

services.label: Our Services
services.title: We Deliver Everything You Need
services.description: We provide tailored logistics solutions, designed to meet your needs and executed with precision and expertise.
services.projectLogistics_desc: Expert handling of complex cargo through air, sea, or land transport.
services.contractLogistics_desc: Comprehensive logistics management designed for efficiency, scalability, and growth.
services.heavyLifting_desc: Safe and precise movement of oversized, heavy, and specialized cargo.
services.internationalFreight_desc: Reliable global freight solutions ensuring safe and timely delivery worldwide.
services.dangerousGoods_desc: Secure and compliant transport solutions for hazardous and sensitive materials.
services.multimodaTransport_desc: Seamless cargo delivery combining air, sea, and land networks.

workProcess.label: How We Work
workProcess.title: Our Work Process
workProcess.description: A proven logistics workflow that ensures every shipment moves efficiently — from planning and coordination to delivery and performance optimization.

workProcessItem.title: Consultation & Planning
workProcessItem.description: We analyze your logistics needs, routes, and timelines to create tailored shipping strategies that maximize efficiency and minimize cost.

workProcessItem.title: Excecution & Coordination
workProcessItem.description: Our team manages every operational detail — from cargo handling and customs clearance to multimoda transport coordination — ensuring smooth, on-time delivery.

workProcessItem.title: Monitoring & Optimization
workProcessItem.description: We continuously track your shipments and analyze performance data to enhance reliability, transparency, and future logistics efficiency.

about.title: About Us
about.description: Learn more about our company and mission
